article_title: New Signup Numbers Show Why Obamacare May Be Impossible To Repeal

article_metadata.description: For Republicans who want to repeal the Affordable Care Act, there is a major problem: many people may hate the law, but just as many like it. “The thing that bothers me is people constantly forget that all politics is local, and that there’s great variation in the extent to which [...]
